gw.api.domain.statistics

Class StatsWindowUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.statistics.StatsWindowUtil

  • public class StatsWindowUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    StatsWindowUtil provides one location for consistent interpretation of statistics window configuration values.
    Author:
    dmount

      • getCutoffDate

        public static java.util.Date getCutoffDate(java.util.Date date,
                                           int windowSizeParam)
        Calculates the number of days back in time to look for statistical information.
        Parameters:
        date - Date to find relative window for.
        windowSizeParam -

        0 = this week

        -1 = this month

        N > 0 = N days back

        Returns:
        Number of days before today to look in order to satisfy the parameter constraints.
